text: Lloyd Wolfe Bochner (July 29, 1924 â€“ October 29, 2005) was a Canadian movie, television, stage, and voice actor. He is known for his television role as Chief Inspector Neil Campbell in Hong Kong and as the voice of Gotham City's Mayor Hamilton Hill in Batman: The Animated Series and in The New Batman Adventures. He won an ACTRA Award in 2004. Bochner was born on July 29, 1924 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Bochner was married to Ruth Roher until his death in 2005.
